downloadTitle: Microsoft Office Live Meeting Service Administrator's Guide
downloadDescription: This guide provides the information administrators need to deploy Microsoft Office Live Meeting clients, configure their conference center, and manage the Microsoft Office Live Meeting service within their organizations.
detailsSection: This guide provides the information administrators need to deploy Microsoft Office Live Meeting clients, configure their conference center, and manage the Microsoft Office Live Meeting service within their organizations. It includes information about deploying Live Meeting clients and the Conferencing Add-in for Microsoft Office Outlook, using Live Meeting Web Access, and configuring settings for your conference center.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office applications:
    • Microsoft Office Word 2007
    • Microsoft Office Word 2003
    • Microsoft Office Word 2002
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:

Save the file to a directory on your computer.

Instructions for use:

After you save the file, open the document as you typically would.

To remove this download:

Delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
